bedroom.description: You are in a dusty, Victorian bedroom. Moonlight bleeds through the curtains. There is a large oak wardrobe in the corner and a bed.

inside_wardrobe.description: The wardrobe creaks open. It smells of mothballs. In the back, you see a small, rusty box.

secret_letter.description: You open the box. There is a letter! It reads: 'Lisa never left the mansion. She is still watching you.'

trigger_event.system_instruction_update: You have just discovered that 'Lisa' is a ghost haunting this house. You are now scared and whisper your responses. You urge the user to leave immediately.
